tool_description:
- Retrieve a core idea for any phrase
- Multiple languages Supported
name: Any Definition
title: Any Definition

api_list.name: word
api_list.description: Get the core idea for any sentence
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://any-definition1.p.rapidapi.com/word/Hello World"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "any-definition1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://any-definition1.p.rapidapi.com/word/{phrase}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "any-definition1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
